name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email Row Highlighter for Gmail™ and Inbox™

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights Gmail and Inbox rows on mouse over with nice and shiny colors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Email Row Highlighter for Gmail™ and Inbox™ enhances your email experience by highlighting rows in Gmail and Inbox with vibrant, eye-catching colors as you hover your mouse over them.

Customizing the highlight color is simple and intuitive. Just click on the popup button, navigate to the settings page, and choose any color that suits your style. Make your email management not only more efficient but also more visually appealing, with colors that reflect your personality.
